Question.Subject: How to take snapshots of you and the person your talking to on skype?
Question.Content: I wanna take pictures from skype, like a double picture of me and who im talking to.. how is that? thanks in advance =)
Question.ChosenAnswer: right next to teh f1 f2 keys there is one button called printscreen sysRq press that when u want to take shot and then goto paint and edit and paste it there then save !! your done 10 points plzz

Answer.Content: right next to teh f1 f2 keys there is one button called printscreen sysRq press that when u want to take shot and then goto paint and edit and paste it there then save !! your done 10 points plzz
